attributes.description: Network anomaly detection dashboard showing unusual traffic patterns, protocol violations, geographic anomalies, and potential data exfiltration. Uses Suricata IDS data enriched with GeoIP for comprehensive network visibility in GKE environments.

attributes.title: Network Anomaly Detection Dashboard
